Package com.reminder.project.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.reminder.project.controller.UserController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("api/users")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
USercontroller contains all API endpoints connected to a user and its actions on the application.
Author:
Hugo

  • Method Details

    • deleteAccount

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{password}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteAccount​(@PathVariable java.lang.String password)
      Delete Endpoint to give the user the option to delete their account. They have to be logged in to the application and confirm their action by write their password
      Parameters:
      password - A users password
      Returns:
      ResponseStatusException Forbidden if the user enters wrong password

    • getCars

      @GetMapping("cars") public java.util.List<Car> getCars()
      Get endpoint to fetch all cars connected to specific User id.
      Returns:
      List of cars

    • addCar

      @PostMapping("car") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addCar​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Car car)
      Post Endpoint to add a new car to the DB
      Parameters:
      car - Gets a car object as param
      Returns:
      Can return two different ResponseStatusExceptions.

    • removeCar

      @DeleteMapping("car/delete/{licensePlate}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> removeCar​(@Valid @PathVariable @Valid java.lang.String licensePlate)
      Delete Endpoint to delete specific car from DB.
      Parameters:
      licensePlate - gets the car licenseplate as param
      Returns:
      a ResponseStatusException if something went wrong.

    • updateUser

      @PatchMapping("update") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateUser​(@RequestBody UserDto userDto)
      Patch Endpoint that updates a users personal information
      Parameters:
      userDto - takes a userDTO as param
      Returns:

    • getUserInformation

      @GetMapping("user") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserInformation()
      Get Endpoint to fetch userdata from DB
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity.Status ok or not_found

    • isUserPremium

      @GetMapping("isUserPremium") public boolean isUserPremium()
      Get Endpoint that fetches user role from DB - Can be premium or standard
      Returns:
      returns boolean

    • setTireNotice

      @PatchMapping("tireNotice") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setTireNotice​(@RequestBody Car car)
      Patch Endpoint to change boolean value in DB
      Parameters:
      car - as param to change specific car in DB
      Returns:
      ResponseStatusException based on HttpStatus

    • isLoggedIn

      @GetMapping("isLoggedIn") public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Simple Get Endpoint to see if a specific user in logged in. Used to show different menu alternatives on frontend.
      Returns:
      boolean

    • passwordChange

      @PatchMapping("password-change") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> passwordChange​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid PasswordRequestData passwordData)
      Patch Endpoint to change a user password.
      Parameters:
      passwordData - see PasswordRequestData class above
      Returns:
      See Also:
      PasswordRequestData
